title: Stylish Maseru Retreat in Lesotho's Capital
description: Escape from the city, in the city, at Avani Maseru Hotel, set against a rugged mountainscape in Lesotho's vibrant capital. Head off on an afternoon of horse riding and hiking through the rolling landscape, organised by the resort, or choose one of the many tours showcasing the villages scatted within the mountains. Return to lounge in the sunshine by the spectacular pool and feast on local flavours at Mohokare Restaurant.

title: Southern Africa City Stay in Lesotho with Daily Breakfast
description: Enjoy sweeping views of Lesotho’s capital city and surrounding countryside when you stay at Avani Lesotho Hotel & Casino, Maseru’s swankiest, hilltop-perched hotel. Let your worries melt away with a sauna session or roll the dice on velvet tables at the onsite casino - the choice is yours. Fuel up from the hotel's various dining options before travelling out to tumbling waterfalls to soak in the country's unspoilt terrain.
offer_address: Avani Lesotho Hotel & Casino, Hilton Road, Maseru 100, Lesotho
